articles.title: Suresh Raina set to return to cricket, will play for UP in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Raina announced his retirement from International cricket in August this year, but the World Cup-winning cricketer will continue to play domestic cricket for his native state of Uttar Pradesh and in the Indian Premier League.
articles.content: Former India batsman Suresh Raina is all set to represent his home state of Uttar Pradesh in the much-awaited Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy which is slated to take place in January next year. Raina announc… [+1086 chars]

articles.description: Mushfiqur Rahim had an angry confrontation with a teammate after a collision almost caused a dropped catch in a domestic T20 match.
